title: Fernandes 'hurt' that Man Utd 'wanted him to go' to Saudi
subtitle: Manchester United captain Bruno Fernandes says it "hurt" to realise the club "wanted me to leave" when Saudi Arabian club Al-Hilal proposed a huge offer in the summer.
full_text: Manchester United captain Bruno Fernandes says it "hurt" to realise the club "wanted me to leave" when Saudi Arabian club Al-Hilal proposed a huge offer in the summer.
